timeline.bodyText:
Fix to meet the requirements.
https://github.com/TechEmpower/FrameworkBenchmarks/wiki/Project-Information-Framework-Tests-Overview#database-updates
vii. Each World object must have its randomNumber field updated to a new random integer between 1 and 10000.
World->randomNumber = mt_rand(1, 10000);
This code never update de World object only send the new randomnumber to the bd.
viii. Each World object must be persisted to the database with its new randomNumber value.
World->update();
Now it's using SQL to change the values.
Using SQL for that simple action, break to be a Full ORM.
